checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/release-name-amvd' should be added.
Default service account with token mounted. automountServiceAccountToken should be set to 'false' on either the ServiceAccount or on the PodSpec or a non-default service account should be used.
Capability Drop list should be set to ALL. Add the specific ones you need to the Add list and set an override label.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the PodSecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is set to 'false' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/release-name-amvd-manifests' should be added.
Security Context not set. The Security Context should be specified and all Capabilities should be dropped by setting the Drop list to ALL.
allowPrivilegeEscalation not set which allows privilege escalation. It should be set to 'false'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
